TodayDate.script: return (((new Date()).getMonth()+1 < 10 ? '0': '') + ((new Date()).getMonth()+1) + '/' +  (((new Date()).getDate()) < 10 ? + '0' : '') + ((new Date()).getDate()) + '/' + (new Date()).getFullYear());

YesterdayDate.script: return (((new Date()).getMonth()+1 < 10 ? '0': '') + ((new Date()).getMonth()+1) + '/' +  (((new Date()).getDate() - 1) < 10 ? + '0' : '') + ((new Date()).getDate() - 1) + '/' + (new Date()).getFullYear());

fromLast2Days.script: return (((new Date()).getMonth()+1 < 10 ? '0': '') + ((new Date()).getMonth()+1) + '/' +  (((new Date()).getDate() - 1) < 10 ? + '0' : '') + ((new Date()).getDate() - 1) + '/' + (new Date()).getFullYear());

fromLast3Days.script: return (((new Date()).getMonth()+1 < 10 ? '0': '') + ((new Date()).getMonth()+1) + '/' +  (((new Date()).getDate() - 2) < 10 ? + '0' : '') + ((new Date()).getDate() - 2) + '/' + (new Date()).getFullYear());

fromLast7Days.script: return (((new Date()).getMonth()+1 < 10 ? '0': '') + ((new Date()).getMonth()+1) + '/' +  (((new Date()).getDate() - 6) < 10 ? + '0' : '') + ((new Date()).getDate() - 6) + '/' + (new Date()).getFullYear());
